I think I have just the right recommendations for you!

Have you considered "The Lego Movie"? It's a fun and quirky animated film that explores what happens when an ordinary LEGO construction worker is thought to be the prophesied "special" one. With an all-star voice cast, including Alison Brie, Will Ferrell, and Morgan Freeman, it's a wild ride that's sure to delight.

Or if you're in the mood for something a bit more thought-provoking, you might enjoy "You" (2014). This psychological thriller explores themes of right and wrong when someone's sense of morality is tested. With a gripping plot and strong performances, it's definitely worth checking out!
